title: Thunder In Paradise
description: The end of the Millennium is at hand. Serenity and beauty have long reigned for the inhabitants of Paradise, but Satan's release will soon shatter their peace. Bound in chains for one thousand years, the Devil is bursting with strategies to deceive all mankind. He's out to destroy as many as he can. One of his prime targets is Solomon Action, a young man struggling with his identity and faith. If Satan has his way, Solomon will be his trophy of trophies! As the final battle between good and evil unfolds, there is only one salvation for grace and mercy. Will he respond to God's love in time?
author: Jonathan R. Cash
